## `SelectWindow`

Selects a window in the project.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
SelectWindow(SideBarSection section,
             number windowId)
```


### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
|[`SideBarSection`](#sidebarsection) section | The section (along the sidebar) where the window is in. | 
|`number` windowId | The window's ID. |
